title: OpenMPI entries in `packages.yaml`  halt `spack spec openmpi`
body:
I use `$SPACK_ROOT/etc/spack/packages.yaml` to list packages installed outside this Spack instance. It worked quite well before until I updated  Spack to 030127a0 this morning.

Steps to reproduce this issue:

1. Copy the following contents to `$SPACK_ROOT/etc/spack/packages.yaml`.
2. Run `spack spec openmpi` which seems to take forever long.

```
packages:
  openmpi:
    variants: +pmi +slurm +verbs
    paths:
       openmpi@2.0.2%gcc@6.3.0~java~mxm+pmi~psm~psm2+slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm+verbs+vt: /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-6.3.0/openmpi-2.0.2-wo3vh6hf2b64jhmlbvnapkaxlhkaxc2l
       openmpi@2.0.2%gcc@5.4.0~java~mxm+pmi~psm~psm2+slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm+verbs+vt: /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-5.4.0/openmpi-2.0.2-sdnvo6to5jle2fufhrne5d57zuppnjzy
       openmpi@2.0.2%gcc@4.8.5~java~mxm+pmi~psm~psm2+slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm+verbs+vt: /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/openmpi-2.0.2-n5tkfvldpp6v3onps73oymbkmwfu4qsx
       openmpi@2.0.2%intel@17.0.2~java~mxm+pmi~psm~psm2+slurm~sqlite3~thread_multiple~tm+verbs+vt: /lustre/spack/tools/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-17.0.2/openmpi-2.0.2-q6jivijtq2ktnvqqlycldqvcqgjj4if6
    buildable: False
```
